title: Один летний день
author: Sokolovsky Oleg
description:
Oleg Sokolovskiy is one of the best landscape masters. His works is a real fairy tale. So many little details and so clear visual perception. A bunch of colors and mastercraft leave the impression of a miracle. This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'One Summer Day' is related to realism being a representative of landscapes genre. 

This artwork took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates and galleries art catalogues.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
